ygData.subject: Re: [eqbard] A Bard's usefulness after lvl 12
ygData.msgSnippet: ... In keeping with the latest theory, what is your charisma?  :-) Mine is 110.  I have found lullaby to be a fantastic song. The only creatures that
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 19 May 1999, Abraham Hardjana wrote:
>
> Has the lullaby song been fixed or improved? When I first bought it a
> level 15, I was unable to lull even a widow hatchling. To me that is kind
> of useless. Perhaps I have improved. As for finding better friends, I

In keeping with the latest theory, what is your charisma? :-)

Mine is 110. I have found lullaby to be a fantastic song.
The only creatures that consistently resist it are reds, but
then those are the mobs my group targets first. Yellows
resist it maybe 30%-60% of the time (which still makes it
worthwhile). Blues maybe 20%-40%. Greens often end up asleep
almost throughout an entire fight, waking up only a couple
times before going back to sleep (which is good because greens
start attacking you if they happen to be nearby when you sing
it). I have used it on dervishes, undead, wisps, bears, fire
elements, and those spellcasting snakes in lavastorm.

> BTW Did people actually right in a character description in their
> character screen? I have and nobody looks at it. They just query my
> armor and then run away. It frustrates me so because I have been trying

I read it. :-)

> Treilanin - Karana - Bard of the 16th Rank

What area do you play in? I've been spending time around
Freeport lately.

Kaearia (Karana) L16

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
